doctor.name: Dr. Bablu Kumar Saha
doctor.info: Dr. Bablu Kumar Saha is a Pediatric Surgeon in Rangpur. His qualification is MBBS, MS (Pediatric Surgery). He is working as a Pediatric Surgeon doctor in Rangpur Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Update Diagnostic, Rangpur. Practicing hour of Dr. Bablu Kumar Saha at Update Diagnostic, Rangpur is Unknown. Please call to know visiting hour.
